title: FlexWork - The Part time marketplace for students
description: A platform built to connect Students with Businesses and Part time work opportunities enabling Students to earn and gain experience and allowing Businesses to hire fresh talent. (Private)

title: YC Directory
description:
An app that allows startup founders to pitch their startups, gain awareness and funding opportunities. 
I built this while learning the core concepts of NextJS, Oauth and Content Management Systems like Sanity.

title: LBS Gazette
description: A Newspaper app built for colleges and universities to publish and distribute news articles related to the organization and beyond. Authors can create and publish articles, readers and read and comment and Admins can monitor.

title: BlogShare
description: A Blogging app that allows users to write and share blogs. I built this to learn advanced CRUD operations.

title: The Notes App
description: A simple notes app that I built to learn the basics of backend and simple CRUD operations

title: The WireLess
description: A News website that delivers fresh news from around the world using NewsAPI. I built this to learn and understand the basics of react and API integration.

title: Calm UI Clone
description: A UI Clone of Calm's website I built to learn the basics of CSS and design

title: Four Seasons UI Clone
description: A UI Clone of Four Seasons' website I built to learn the basics of CSS and design
